segments.text: I see the woman focused on drying that plate at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize the water is pouring over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a huge puddle right under her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't noticed yet, which is really startling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over to the side, a boy's on a stool reaching into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, about to tip back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart jumps thinking he could fall any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl beside him is holding out her hand expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're quietly sneaking cookies, unaware of the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden through the window is so peaceful in comparison.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how much is happening without anyone knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will turn around soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could turn into a big accident so quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a tense scene to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm on edge just watching it all.
segments.speaker: PAR
